maqras.text: they nie roam zem robit note consequences for those before them? They pouzivat bol stronger than they productive on zem. GOD punished them ich zhresit nothing chranit them GOD
Ze je ich posol ist them zretelny proofs they disbelieved Consequently GOD punished them. He je Vela strict v enforcing retribution
My sent Moses our znamenie profound authority
Do Pharaoh Haamaan Qaaroon. they said kuzelnik; liar
A when he showed them truth z us they said Kill syn z those verit him rezervny ich dcera. Thus kut plany disbelievers bol vzdy zlomyselny
Pharaoh said Let mna kill Moses let him implore jeho Lord Ja znepokojit lest he zhnity tvoj nabozenstvo spreads zly throughout zem
Moses said ja seek refuge moj Lord tvoj Lord z kazdy arrogant jeden nie verit v Dni Reckoning

verit clovek Pharaoh's ludia zatajit jeho belief je said Ako ona kill clovek mozem iba for saying ‘Moj Lord GOD ' he shown ona je has zretelny proofs z tvoj Lord he bol liar je jeho problem a he bol truthful ona benefit z jeho promises Iste GOD nie guide any transgressor liar
O moj zaludnit dnes ona have kingship upperhand! Kto pomoc us against GOD's judgment should it pojdem us? Pharaoh said Ona je nasledovat len co ja see zachvat; ja guide ona len na pravo chodnicek
Jeden verit said O moj ludia ja fear ona same fate previous opponents
opponents Noah ‘Aad Thamoud others pojdem them. GOD NIE zelat si any injustice LUDIA
O moj ludia ja fear for ona Dni z Zvolat
Je dni when ona zelat turn around flee! nothing chranit ona potom GOD Whomever GOD sends astray nothing guide him

Joseph pojdem ona before ze zretelny revelations ona zotrvat doubt jeho odkaz! Potom when he umrel ona said GOD will nie send any inaksie posol him! (He bol posledny posol!) GOD thus sends astray those bol transgressors doubtful
They argue GOD's revelations any zaklad. This bol trait vela abhorred GOD by those verit. GOD thus ZAPECATIT SRDCE KAZDY arrogant tyrant
Pharaoh said O Haamaan build mna high tower ja zastihnut out discover
(Ja chudoba zastihnut heaven berie look god Moses Ja verit he bol liar. Thus je zly robota Pharaoh zdobit do jeho oci thus he kept nasledovat na) pravo) chodnicek! Pharaoh's kut plany bol truly zly
Jeden verit said O moj zaludnit nasledovat mna ja guide ona do riadne
O moj ludia this prvy zivot bol temporary iluzia chvila Hereafter bol eternal abode
Whoever commits zhresit requited iba ze whoever zavodny righteousness! -Muzsky zena -chvila verit these zapisat Raj wherein they receive provisions any limits
